text: The swab samples received were blended in the transport medium by vortexing and 400µL of this blend was used to extract viral nucleic acid. Nucleic acid extraction was performed according to supplier's instructions on EZ1 Biorobot (Qiagen Inc. Hilden, Germany) using EZ1 Virus mini kit v2.0 (Qiagen Inc.) and final elution volume of 60µL.
